• Online multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated caves and real-time player interaction.
  • Mobile-optimized controls including touch D-pad and action buttons for building, mining, and chat.

Mega Miner Online is a browser-based multiplayer mining game featuring real-time cave exploration, resource gathering, and social interaction. Players can dig procedurally generated caves, upgrade their equipment, trade with others, and build structures in a shared world. The game includes mobile-optimized touch controls, persistent cloud saves, and a complete admin system for room management.
